text: Yosef Hamadani Cohen (; born 1916 - 29 March 2014) was an Iranian Jewish religious leader. He was the chief rabbi of the Jewish people in Iran from January 1994 until his death. Before this, he was the rabbi of Yusef Abad Synagogue. Cohen died after a long illness on 29 March 2014 in Tehran over Shabbat. He was 98 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1916 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Chief rabbis Category:Disease-related deaths in Iran Category:Iranian Jews Category:People from Tehran
title: Yosef Hamadani Cohen
